Get To Know Us

India’s top bike taxi services


Get To Know Us India’s top bike taxi services (Headline) We have created on-demand bike taxi services that will fulfill the customer and rider experience. A new mode of travel which makes it easy for the customers as we provide a disruptive service model.

We are here to serve you better in all ways for both the customers and riders. Our services are entirely assist based applications that are accessible and also ensure high-end security for users for safer rides.

Why Mopedo?


Why Mopedo? We offer reliable commute services with the latest tracking solution, risk-free onboarding system and verifying pilot rides in a jiffy using the best technology. It will be the most affordable and best bike taxis service in India.

What we have in store

Features

Easy onboarding process and uses AI based facial recognition for verification.

Easy onboarding process and uses AI based facial recognition for verification.

Easy onboarding process and uses AI based facial recognition for verification.

Benefits

GPS enabled tracking - You can easily track your ride status within the app more accurately.

Quick ETA (Traffic Congestion) - You will get a quick ETA when your ride starts; this would help you get a better idea of your trip status

Read more

Pilot Services

Mopedo Ride - You can provide taxi services to pick-up and drop the customer in two or Three wheeler that you own.

Mopedo Logistics- You can provide transportation of customer’s products from one location to another in a two or three wheeler vehicle owned by you.
